title: Crime Alert 03.14.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 03.14.19
description:
California parents tackle registered sex offender trying to snatch tots from the playground. ‘Desperate Housewives’ star won’t be leaving the country any time soon as a judge restricts her travel during college admission scandal arrest. Babysitter’s pit bull mix mauls six-month-old baby boy to death. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
